text: Yui Kamiji was the defending champion, but lost in the semifinals to Aniek van Koot. Jiske Griffioen won the title, defeating van Koot in the final, 6–0, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ==References== * Draw Wheelchair Women's Singles French Open, 2015 Women's Singles
title: 2015 French Open – Wheelchair Women's Singles
